# Accordion Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Default | `app-accordion panel panel-default` |
| Primary | `app-accordion panel panel-primary` |
| Secondary | `app-accordion panel panel-secondary` |
| Tertiary | `app-accordion panel panel-tertiary` |
